content: पारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पॄ भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Carrying across, bringing over. {@--2@} Saving, delivering. --णः {@--1@} A cloud. {@--2@} Satisfaction. --णं {@--1@} Accomplishing, fulfilling. {@--2@} Reading through, perusal. {@--3@} Eating after a fast, concluding a fast. {@--4@} The complete text of a book. --णा {@--1@} Eating after a fast, concluding a fast; कारय चक्षुषी पारणां <ls>Vb. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 39</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">55</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">70.</ls> {@--2@} Eating (in general); <ls>Ku. 5. 22</ls>; (अभ्यवहारकर्म <ls>Malli.</ls>).
